generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is the primary surface for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by curbs and featuring pedestrians.
- building: Several modern buildings are visible in the background, including one with "BW Bank" signage and another with large glass windows and flags.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and bushes lining the left side of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil areas are visible along the roadside, particularly on the left side and in the foreground.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast with clouds.
- person: Two people are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A silver car is visible driving ahead in the same direction as the camera's perspective.
- truck: A large white garbage truck is prominently visible in the center-right of the image, moving away from the camera.
- traffic sign: A triangular "road work ahead" sign is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including the one holding the traffic sign on the left and others along the sidewalk on the right.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
